marklogic.body: In one tweet he rails about turning Off the Heat at night in order to lower body temperatures to live longer. In the next tweet he exhorts everyone to sleep together in one bed to keep body temperatures elevated. Love the logic. BTW, the number of polar bears has increased by several thousands since the 1960's. I don't think there is any danger of polar bears going away anytime soon. Don't remember much about Conseco's career, but wasn't he hit in the head more than a few times?
